nodes.name: Texas Data Privacy and Security Act
nodes.description: Comprehensive state consumer data privacy law that regulates the collection, use, processing, and sale of personal data of Texas residents. Grants consumers rights to access, correct, delete, and port their personal data, and to opt-out of targeted advertising, data sales, and profiling. Requires businesses to obtain consent for processing sensitive data and conduct data protection assessments for high-risk processing activities.
